data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for The Un-Audited Financial Results For The Quarter/Nine Months Ended On December 312025
data.news_body:
Advance Agrolife Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 07/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve Un-audited Financial results for the quarter and nine months ended 31 December 2025 along with Limited review report to be received from the Statutory Auditors of the Company for
the quarter and nine months ended on December 31 2025.

Further in continuation of our letter dated December 24 2025 regarding intimation of trading window closure we would like to confirm that trading window for trading in securities of the Company will remain closed to all the Designated Persons and their immediate relatives of the Company till 48 hours after the declaration of Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025.

data.caption: Clarification Regarding Price Movement
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 the Company "Advance Agrolife Limited" hereby submitted the Clarification on significant Movement in Price of security

data.caption: Clarification sought from Advance Agrolife Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Advance Agrolife Ltd on October 27 2025 with reference to significant movement in price in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for To Consider And Approve Unaudited Financial Results Of The Company For Quarter Ended 30Th June 2025
data.news_body: Advance Agrolife Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 29/10/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Intimation regarding Board meeting to consider and approve Unaudited Financial results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June 2025

data.news_body: Intimation Under Regulation 6(1) of SEBI (LODR) regulations 2015 the Company had appointed Nisha Gupta Company Secretary and Compliance officer of Advance Agrolife Limited.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to the provisions of the Companys Code of Internal Procedures and conduct for prohibition of insider trading in dealing with the securities by insiders and in terms of SEBI(Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 the trading window for dealing in securities of the Company shall remain closed from Wednesday October 08 2025 till 48 hours after the declaration of Un-audited financial results for the quarter ended/half year ending September 30 2025.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Advance Agrolife Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from October 08 2025 the equity shares of Advance Agrolife Ltd (Scrip Code: 544562) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of T Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251007-45 dated October 07 2025.
